summary: Build an intelligent travel assistant that helps users plan trips with destination suggestions, day-wise itineraries, budget estimates, recommendations, checklists, reminders, emergency info, and weather tips in a simple, visual, friendly format (with emojis and sections).
architectural_notes: Conversation flow should ask targeted follow-up questions (budget, duration, origin, style, group) before generating plans when needed.
Response formatting should be consistent: sectioned, clear, and include emojis; keep outputs simple and easy to scan.

Prioritize a UI/UX redesign pass to improve visual polish (layout grid, spacing system, typography scale, component consistency) while keeping the travel-friendly theme and avoiding blue/purple as primary colors.
Ensure app branding is consistently "TripMuse" across UI (titles, headers, metadata) and update logo asset accordingly.
After Trip Planner intake submission, automatically generate and display the complete trip plan (destinations, itinerary, budget, etc.) instead of stopping at data entry.
Add a currency setting/default (INR) used consistently in budget estimation and formatting.
Background/backdrop art direction should not be only spiritual; blend travel + spiritual + historical + beaches themes while remaining subtle and preserving text readability.
Update visual theme direction: use a dark, vibrant palette (radiant/neat navy-blue) and avoid white backgrounds (overrides earlier 'avoid blue/purple as primary colors' guidance if still applicable).
Update visual theme direction: shift primary palette/accent to sky blue (replace sunset-orange guidance where conflicting)
known_issues: Current UI/UX design quality is perceived as poor; needs a higher-quality, neater visual design.
Trip plan generation is not producing/showing the full trip information after users enter trip details.
Budget/costs are displayed in USD; needs INR (‚Çπ) support.
App branding still shows "TravelAssist" in places; logo/name should be TripMuse.
User reports the new background change is not visible ('no changing'); verify background asset is applied correctly across the app.
Deployed app appears to show the previous version instead of the latest (possible caching/asset/versioning issue).

existing_features.title: Create a multi-step Trip Planner intake flow that collects smart follow-up answers: budget range, number of days, starting city/country, travel style (luxury/budget/adventure/relaxing), group type (solo/couple/family/friends), travel season/month, and interests.

Implement trip plan generation that, based on intake answers, produces: destination suggestions, a detailed day-wise itinerary, recommended hotels/areas to stay, local food suggestions, must-visit places, weather tips/best travel times, and a packing checklist.
Add travel budget estimation that breaks down costs into stay, food, transport, and attractions; allow users to adjust assumptions (e.g., daily food budget, hotel level) and see totals update.

Add a To-Do Travel Planner that lets users create tasks (title, notes, due date) linked to a trip, mark complete, and filter by status; include in-app reminders (e.g., ‚ÄúDue today/overdue‚Äù indicators) without push notifications.
